channel.title: Blog on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on My Blog

item.title: iMessages/FaceTime logic
item.description: Problems (2 iPhones and 1 Mac): Tel. A (main, ✅ iMessages) Tel. B (backup, ❌ iMessages) email A (login, ✅ iMessages) email B (public, ❌ iMessages) Avoid spam text messages sync to Mac (no TEXTs from Tel. A) disable “Enable Messages in iCloud”: otherwise texts from Tel. A will be synced use iMessage on mac Check “you can be reached for messages at:” despite you disable in the last setting, iMessages can still arrive while regular text won’t.

item.title: itx Build
item.description: See the PCPartPicker Part List for detailed list including the history Build (2019-03-12) Type Item Price(CHF) Price (CNY)* CPU AMD Ryzen 5 2600 3.4 GHz 6-Core Processor 187 1243.55 CPU Cooler Noctua NH-L9x65 SE-AM4 CPU Cooler 59 392.35 Motherboard MSI B450I GAMING PLUS AC Mini ITX AM4 Motherboard 131 871.15 Memory Corsair Vengeance LPX 16 GB (2 x 8 GB) DDR4-3000 CL15 Memory 130 864.5 Storage Samsung 970 Evo Plus 1 TB M.
